text:
Newly opened clinic in late August 2022, serving residents in the vicinity. Went on a Saturday evening, as my hubby was experiencing stomach discomfort.

When we first approached the clinic, the signage was indicated “closed” but interior lights were on, so we went in and checked with the clinic staff. She immediately rectified the signage issue. There was no one in the clinic and 1 clinic staff manning the counter. Clinic is clean and well maintained. The whole process from registration and seeing doctor to medication collection took about 15 mins.

My hubby was diagnosed with food poisoning, and felt slightly better 15 mins after taking the given meds.

Poor Service, female doctor is rude, annoyed. She asked a question about my mensus history, i open my phone to check and she is very annoyed and ask, "no need very accurate, just tell me roughly". NO PATIENCE AT ALL.
The doctor told me, if I need IHP to book an appointment to the specialist for me, let the front desk know.
When I am collecting my referral letter from the front desk, the receptionist asked me to book specialist on my own. I said, the doctor mentioned I can book through IHP by informing you. Then the receptionist said, okay IHP will contact you in 2-3 working days.

4 working days later, I called the clinic and ask if there is any update from IHP. They told me they will check and call me back.
No call back, no update.
I called IHP directly and was informed that there is no appointment request from the panel clinic under my profile.
What a bad service from 1 Aljunied Medical.

came here instead of YSL clinic because there was no queue. unfriendly receptionist, Dr Goh Ruo Xuan wasn’t friendly either; uncompasssionate, unwilling to listen, 3 second physical examination and can’t wait to get me out of the room so just suggested a referral. now understanding why the clinic was empty, definitely would not come back and would not recommend anyone to come here (there are a few other clinics nearby)
The doctor and the clinic staff are nice n friendly. Understood that the doctor of the day was a stand in but he was professional and detailed in making sure i understand all conditions n concerns.

Dr Zhang a very meticulous,caring,friendly Doctor whom greets each patient who enters in regardless of seniority.
He explains in detail when further test is required each time.
Is also back by a surpportive reception staff whom explains clearly for consumption of medication.
Last but not least clinic environment was clean & tidy.
Thank you Dr Zhang & team!
